author: vkhristenko
body:
This is the 2nd iteration of updates for HCAL DQM. We need that by the time collisions arrive...

Things that are majorly updated:
1) previously, I used std::vector<> to hold the MonitorElements, however now it is boost::unordered_map<uint32_t, T> It's integrated with the use of DataFormats/HcalDetId classes. 
2) DQM/HcalCommon adds some additional classes for Electronics <-> Detector Conversions - all of that is again heavily based on DataFormats/HcalDetId classes
3) DQM Harvesting is added + reportSummaryMap to show up for the Summary Workspace in DQM GUI
4) 2 new Monitioring Tasks are added: TPComparisonTask and DigiComparisonTask. These 2 modules are for VME vs uTCA (HBHE) comparison. because of doing reco twice makes workflow very slow... 
These guys are suppposed to be used in Online DQM only - not in Offline Workflows. That will require a special config for them and will be discussed with Central DQM people...

A few things that have partially been accommodated from David Lange's comments:
1) Constants - FED Constants have been replaced by the central values (from FEDNumbering...) reassigned...
Other constants will  have to be migrated later...
2) const refs, in Utilities.h I fixed places where there were no const refs - I've tried to put them everywhere where it was neccessary - I realize that it's a performance problem
3) Templating is not done at the moment - but that should be done for 810

I realize that this PR is quite big once again... but I think it should be the last one of such size....
I've tested 3 runTheMatrix tests - all successful.

Let me know...
VK
title: HCAL DQM Updates in preparation for Collissions
